meanings.sent1: The slow driver was a hinderer on the road.
meanings.sent2: The construction noise was a constant hinderer to my concentration.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn vending machine became a hinderer of my snack plans.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of failure acted as a mental hinderer to her success.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds were a looming hinderer of the sunny picnic.

meanings.definition: Something that causes delay or difficulty.
meanings.sent1: The long line at the store was a hinderer to my quick errand.
meanings.sent2: Lack of preparation can be a hinderer in achieving your goals.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain was a hinderer to our outdoor party plans.
meanings.sent4: Procrastination is a common hinderer of productivity.
meanings.sent5: A broken shoelace can be a small but annoying hinderer in your day.
